lines: WARNING - THIS EPISODE CONTAINS SUBJECT MATTER OF A SEXUAL NATURE.
You have recently found out that ${loverName} is married. Do you still want to continue this relationship with him?
You should go to the relationship icon and meet someone else.
You and ${loverName} make plans to sneak away for a night of adventure and romance. You will meet at his place. ${loverName}'s wife is out of town on business. What would you like to do?
#HAVE A COZY EVENING OF SENSUAL DELIGHTS (WINK! WINK!)
When you arrive at ${loverName}'s home, he comes to the door barechested. He has on slippers and pajama bottoms. It looks like he wants to spend the evening in bed.
#RUSH INTO HIS ARMS ANS SAY, "TAKE ME, YOU ANIMAL!"
#TELL HIM TO GET DRESSED AND GET READY TO GO OUT

His body seems unusually stiff. Could he be playing hard to get? A voice in the background calls out, "Hey! Who's out there, anyway? Tell them to go away so we can be ALONE." It's ${loverName}'s wife.

You turn to him for an explanation. He tells you quickly that her trip was cancelled at the last minute. He tried to phone you, but you had already left. "What's going on out there?" his wife shouts out. "HEY...Who is this?" ${loverName} breaks
down and tells her the whole story. You guessed it -- she's the jealous type. SLAAAPP!!
The next day ${loverName} calls to apologize and says that maybe it would be better if the two of you don't see each other any more. You are too old to play these kinds of games. In case you are
wondering, you are the fourth casualty this month.

${loverName} puts his fingers to his lips. His wife's trip was cancelled. He tried to call and tell you not to come over, but it was too late -- you had already left. ${loverName} becomes very sad, almost tearful. He feels guilty and wrong about the
affair, and explains that it might be best for the two of you not to see each other for a while.
